com.hp.autonomy.frontend.reports.powerpoint

Interface ImageSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataUriImageSource, WebAndDataUriImageSource

    public interface ImageSource
    An interface to convert image identifiers into actual image data for embedding into PowerPoint. The default implementation (DataUriImageSource) only handles data URIs, but if you have a more compact representation to uniquely identify your images, you could provide your own custom ImageSource class to convert your compact image identifiers into actual image data; which would save some round-trip data. If you have a mix of HTTP/HTTPs links and data uris, you can use WebAndDataUriImageSource. You may want to override WebAndDataUriImageSource.allowHttpURI which only allows URL paths ending in '.jpeg', '.jpg', '.png' or '.gif' with your own whitelist.
    See Also:
    DataUriImageSource, WebAndDataUriImageSource

      • getImageData

        ImageData getImageData(String imageId)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Converts an image identifier into image data.
        Parameters:
        imageId - the image identifier.
        Returns:
        image data corresponding to the image.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if we can't fetch the image.
